short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimal & powerful new tab experience, helps you in productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing with our minimal yet powerful new tab extension.
Organize your favorite websites into customizable collections for quick access and streamline your workflow.
Save your current tabs effortlessly with our Cleanup Tabs feature, ensuring you never lose valuable research or work and can start fresh.
Access your recently closed tabs instantly, and personalize your new tab with custom backgrounds from our curated collection or your own images.
With seamless cloud sync, your personalized settings and collections follow you across all devices. Elevate your browsing experience today!

Truly free and feedbacks are considered, feel free to send to ashu@equibre.com .
